Package com.verisign.getdns

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GetDNSConstants
    This class contains important constants for keys and values for GetDNS request and responses.
    IGetDNSCallback  
    IGetDNSContext
    This interface contains all the getdns function
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GetDNSContext
    The design here is slightly different from the C API in the following ways: Return the object created or the response Throw an exception in case of any issues
    GetDNSFactory  
    GetDNSFutureResult
    This is used for Asyc call implementation
    GetDNSUtil
    This class generally extracts the DNS response and gives the required output
    RRType
    This class contains RRype
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContextOptionName
    Creates a context, an opaque object which describes the environment within which a DNS query executes.
    ContextOptionValue  
    ExtensionName
    Extensions are java HashMap, with the keys being the names of the extensions.
    GetDNSReturn  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GetDNSException
    Handles all JNI exceptions
